articles.description: The 19-year old has attracted attention from Manchester United though the  club insist that, while he is of interest, they are not in advanced talks with his club.
articles.content:
Chelsea have stepped into the chase for Ecuador midfielder Moises Caicedo.

articles.author: Alex Richards
articles.title: Liverpool secure first January transfer as teenage star completes £500k switch - Mirror Online
articles.description: Calum Scanlon, the 15-year-old left-sided player, joins the Premier League champions from the Championship club in a deal worth in the region of £500k
articles.content:
Liverpool have signed the Birmingham City youngster Calum Scanlon to further bolster the Reds academy.
